title: 'Morgana' Says look at my big tits this is extreme for a 12 year old game

embed.description: Take screenshots, screen GIFs, and full page captures you can instantly share now and search later. Get the free app for Windows, Mac, and mobile.

body: i hope your planning on changing the splash arts with the rework

replies.body:
agreed tone down braums toxic masculinity too while ur at it

{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

I mean, League of Legends is rated for Teens (Ages 13 and up) so it depends on if the parent allows their 12-year-old to play the game. And to be honest, most 12-year-olds these days have probably seen much worst for their age than Morgana.

> [{quoted}](name=HeyItzSteve,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=BikJNAOw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-19T03:23:12.293+0000)
>
> I mean, League of Legends is rated for Teens (Ages 13 and up) so it depends on if the parent allows their 12-year-old to play the game. And to be honest, most 12-year-olds these days have probably seen much worst for their age than Morgana.

true.
League is rated T. Mild nudity is actually allowed.

You wanna talk about _"look at my tits"_ check out this lewd chizz.

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/58/Taric_ArmoroftheFifthAgeSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20181021021759

The game is rated T (Which means "Teens", meaning 13+). 12 year olds aren't supposed to play it.

Also, tits exist. They *are* a real thing. And people show cleavage in real life.

Honestly, though. Urgot literally shreds people into tiny bits of flesh and bone, and you complain because you can see ~20% of the top half of Morgana's boobs in **one** splash?

> i hope your planning on changing the splash arts with the rework

Morgana's one of the few Champions which i am glad when a new skins pops up ... except few of them like Exiled Morgana, Ghost Bride and Lunar Wraith, those skins are pathetic designed and doesn't match her Succubus/Elfish look
Excuse me have you even seen the splash art of SnowDay Sivir? I actually was super lucky that my parents were out of the room the first time I saw/used that skin a while ago lol
